name: General Mix40 Online Trivia | Mixed 10 Questions | 10 Questions

questions.text: In which work will you find Lensky's aria?
Who was the Greek philosopher that founded modern liberal arts?
Aquiboquil is a purplish-type delicacy found in Chile and Peru. What kind of food is it?
Who was the Sicilian Greek that circumnavigated the world to appease his voracious hunger?
Who was the culinary-author who wrote Deipnosophist (Professors of Dining)?
Which Greek playwright wrote the comedy 'Fishes'?
Who was the author that wrote the book 'Makes Me Want to Holler'?
What did the slang 'redbone' signify to black communities during the 60's?
Which Greek writer first described poetry as conveying the sublime qualities of nature?
Who was the author of 'Saturnalia', describing the dialogic qualities of the seven books of Aulus Gellius?
